För att kunna ladda spel, starta en ny karaktär med samma namn och samma kön som din föregående spelare. Sen gå in i escapemenyn och ladda ett tidigare game. (De kommer upp en förfrågan om man vill 'ersätta' den tidigare karaktären, de gör man inte, savegames finns kvar).

To be able to load games create a new character with the same name and sex. Then load through the escape menu. It will ask you to "replace" the previous character. Choose yes, it won't actually replace anything.

To change language. Go into the language.ini file located in 1C -> Gamename(Russian) -> RESOURCE\INI\texts\
Set ';' infront of "default language = Russian" and remove it infront of english. Note: To be able to load games, you'll have to do as I described above as the menu will be fucked up. Everything else seems to work superbly.

Do like this:

1 download the game

2 install it

3 download the patch 1.3 & 1.4

4 download the latest daemon tools (4.0x) and 
securom loader

5 download the no cd mini image

6 mount the no cd mini image with daemon tools

7 open up the securom loader and chose the game exe

8 (if you want) you can follow the help on page 1 and change the language to english (except the meny)

9 play the game

PS: you might have problems with the size of the menu and talking to npc (computer players/bots)

The problem with the Main/Start menu is solved by copying the two files from
***\RESOURCE\MODELS\MainMenu\Russian to
***\RESOURCE\MODELS\MainMenu\English.

To get a better gaming experience you need to make some changes in the various files inside:
***\RESOURCE\INI\texts\english
For example there is alot of Incorrect variables in the Questbook\Quest_texts.txt file.

This version of the game has a lot of glitches, but I've worked them out to my advantage. It is also limited at this stage, because you can't go to loansharks, churches, or walk the island and find artifacts. But the rest works fine. I've fixed some files and got an excellent squadron and billions of gold and resources saved on one ship. Now I will share all this with you.
Oh, yeah, you can't buy ships, neither. you have to get them by boarding, having at least one officer as a passenger, so you can assign him the new ship.

Because this forum doesn't support long messages, I had to save all the instructions in a text file which you can get at: 

http://www.pl-us.com/pirates/InstallAndSavedGameInstructions.txt

This file will tell you how to install the game so it's mostly all in English and it's working fairly well. 

You can also get from there a saved game I made with a knockout squadron and over 2 billion in gold at your disposal. ;)
